body.p:
Head Quarters 13 Ky Cav
Burksville Ky
Sept 14 64
Mr. Thos. Sanders.
Co. C. 13 Ky Cav at Robt Elliss
Sir

I wish you would gather up any of the Men belonging to the Regt that you can trust and try and estimate the Horse Thieves now Investing the Country between here and Creelsburg on both sides of the Regt River if you should arrest any send them with a guard that will not let them escape only to have them laying by the Roadside

Very Resply.
J. W. Weatherford
Col 13 Ky. Cav
